name: Vegan Avocado Salad
ingredients: 1 ripe avocado, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, 1 cucumber, 1/4 red onion, fresh cilantro, lime juice, salt and pepper
description: Chop all the vegetables and mix them with olive oil and lemon juice. Add salt and pepper to taste.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: 200g spaghetti, 100g pancetta, 2 large eggs, 50g grated Parmesan cheese, black pepper, salt
description: Cook the spaghetti. In a bowl, mix eggs and parmesan. Fry the pancetta, then mix everything together and season with black pepper.

name: Vegetarian Chili
ingredients: 1 can kidney beans, 1 can black beans, 1 can diced tomatoes, 1 bell pepper, 1 onion, chili powder, cumin, salt
description: Sauté the onion and garlic in olive oil. Add the bell peppers, beans, and tomatoes. Season with chili powder and let it simmer for 30 minutes.

name: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: 200g dark chocolate, 150g butter, 200g sugar, 4 large eggs, 150g flour, 1 tsp baking powder
description: Mix the dry ingredients. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs with melted butter and milk. Combine both mixtures and bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
ingredients: 200g grilled chicken breast, mixed greens, 1 cucumber, 1/2 red onion, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper
description: Grill the chicken breast. Chop the vegetables and mix with olive oil and lemon juice. Add the grilled chicken on top.

name: Pancakes
ingredients: 1 cup flour, 1 cup milk, 1 egg, 2 tbsp sugar, 1 tbsp baking powder, salt
description:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt.
2. In another bowl, combine milk, eggs, and melted butter. Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
3. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly grease it. Pour batter onto the skillet, forming pancakes.
4. Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
5. Serve warm with maple syrup.

name: Vegetarian Quiche
ingredients: 1 pie crust, 4 large eggs, 1 cup milk, 1 bell pepper, 1 onion, 100g cheese, salt and pepper
description: Make the dough with flour and butter. Sauté the spinach and onion, then mix with eggs and cheese. Pour into the dough and bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.

name: Vegan Lentil Soup
ingredients: 1 cup lentils, 1 carrot, 1 onion, 2 garlic cloves, 1 can diced tomatoes, vegetable broth, thyme, salt
description: Sauté the onion and garlic in olive oil. Add the carrots, lentils, vegetable broth, and cumin. Cook for 30 minutes until lentils are soft.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: 4 bell peppers, 1 cup cooked rice, 1 can black beans, 1 can diced tomatoes, cheese, spices
description: Cook the rice and ground beef. Mix with tomato sauce, onion, and garlic. Stuff the bell peppers and bake at 180°C for 20 minutes.

name: Fruit Salad
ingredients: 1 cup strawberries, 1 cup blueberries, 1 cup pineapple, 1 banana, mint leaves, lime juice
description:
1. Chop the mixed fruit into bite-sized pieces and place in a large bowl.
2. In a small bowl, whisk together honey and lime juice. Pour over the fruit.
3. Toss gently to combine and coat the fruit.
4. Serve immediately, garnished with fresh mint leaves.

name: Tomato Bruschetta
ingredients: 1 baguette, 4 ripe tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, fresh basil, olive oil, salt and pepper
description: Chop the tomatoes and basil, mix with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Toast the baguette slices and rub with garlic. Top with the tomato mixture.

name: Grilled Tofu Skewers
ingredients: 1 baguette, 4 ripe tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, fresh basil, olive oil, salt and pepper
description: Cut tofu and vegetables into cubes. Marinate in soy sauce, garlic, and ginger. Skewer and grill for 10 minutes.

name: Vegan Chocolate Mousse
ingredients: 200g silken tofu, 100g dark chocolate, 1 tbsp maple syrup, vanilla extract
description: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Chill in the fridge for 30 minutes before serving.

name: Mushroom Risotto
ingredients: 200g arborio rice, 500ml vegetable broth, 100g mushrooms, 1 onion, Parmesan cheese, white wine, salt
description: Sauté the onion and garlic in butter. Add rice and white wine, cook until absorbed. Gradually add broth and mushrooms, stirring until rice is tender.

name: Greek Salad
ingredients: 1 cucumber, 2 tomatoes, 100g feta cheese, olives, olive oil, oregano, salt
description: Chop the vegetables and feta, mix with olive oil and oregano. Add olives and serve chilled.

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
ingredients: 200g quinoa, 1 cup kale, 1 avocado, 1 carrot, sesame seeds, tahini dressing
description: Roast sweet potato and chickpeas. Cook quinoa. Serve with sliced avocado and tahini-lemon dressing.

name: Vegan Pancakes
ingredients: 1 cup flour, 1 cup almond milk, 1 tbsp baking powder, 1 tbsp sugar, a pinch of salt
description: Mix flour, eggs, milk, and sugar. Fry on a hot pan with butter. Serve with your favorite toppings.
